short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Extension provide imo Features and Updates Status.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you want to use and download IMO for laptop or windows/pc/mac? So, You are in the right place, Just install this extension and start using.

This app counts among the most significant number of messaging apps that are competing for users. With this app, you will be able to message, and videocall those whom you love.

How to use this extension?

1. First download and install this extension.
2. Click on the extension icon.
3. You can also read the features of this extension.
4, Now you need to click get imo app button.
